codeSystems.name: AllLanguages
codeSystems.title: All Languages
codeSystems.description: This value set includes all possible codes from BCP-47 (see http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

codeSystems.name: AllergyIntoleranceCategory
codeSystems.title: Allergy Intolerance Category
codeSystems.description: Category of an identified substance associated with allergies or intolerances.

codeSystems.name: AllergyIntoleranceCriticality
codeSystems.title: Allergy Intolerance Criticality
codeSystems.description: Estimate of the potential clinical harm, or seriousness, of a reaction to an identified substance.

codeSystems.name: AllergyIntoleranceType
codeSystems.title: Allergy Intolerance Type
codeSystems.description: Identification of the underlying physiological mechanism for a Reaction Risk.

codeSystems.name: AllergyIntoleranceClinicalStatusCodes
codeSystems.title: AllergyIntolerance Clinical Status Codes
codeSystems.description: Preferred value set for AllergyIntolerance Clinical Status.

codeSystems.name: SubstanceProductAndConditionAndNegationCodes
codeSystems.title: AllergyIntolerance Substance/Product, Condition and Negation Codes
codeSystems.description: This value set includes concept codes for specific substances/pharmaceutical products, allergy or intolerance conditions, and negation/exclusion codes to specify the absence of specific types of allergies or intolerances.

codeSystems.name: AllergyIntoleranceVerificationStatus
codeSystems.title: AllergyIntolerance Verification Status
codeSystems.description: The verification status to support or decline the clinical status of the allergy or intolerance.

codeSystems.name: SNOMEDCTClinicalFindings
codeSystems.title: SNOMED CT Clinical Findings
codeSystems.description: This value set includes all the "Clinical finding" [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) codes - concepts where concept is-a 404684003 (Clinical finding (finding)).

codeSystems.name: CommonLanguages
codeSystems.title: Common Languages
codeSystems.description: This value set includes common codes from BCP-47 (see http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

codeSystems.name: ParticipationRoleType
codeSystems.title: Participation Role Type
codeSystems.description: This FHIR value set is comprised of Actor participation Type codes, which can be used to value FHIR agents, actors, and other role elements. The codes are intended to express how the agent participated in some activity. Sometimes refered to the agent functional-role relative to the activity.

codeSystems.name: AllergyIntoleranceSeverity
codeSystems.title: Allergy Intolerance Severity
codeSystems.description: Clinical assessment of the severity of a reaction event as a whole, potentially considering multiple different manifestations.

codeSystems.name: SNOMEDCTRouteCodes
codeSystems.title: SNOMED CT Route Codes
codeSystems.description: This value set includes all Route codes from SNOMED CT - provided as an exemplar.

codeSystems.name: SubstanceCode
codeSystems.title: Substance Code
codeSystems.description: This value set contains concept codes for specific substances. It includes codes from [SNOMED](http://snomed.info/sct) where concept is-a 105590001 (Substance (substance))

codeSystems.name: ValuEsinemiseSagedus
codeSystems.title: Valu esinemise sagedus
codeSystems.description: Kasutatakse kodu- ja iseseisva statsionaarse õenduse epikriisil ning võimaldab märkida valu esinemise sagedust.
